reviewText: This was originally recorded on VHS and the DVD quality is poor. The advice is dated originally done in 1991 and not updated.
A timeless treasure of racing knowledge. Valuable information for everyone from a newbie to an experienced racer.

The Graphical explanation of the racing stratergies is very good. A good insight for a complex topic as sail boad racing. Video Quality is not that great on a big screen. However the content is useful
